rc_sticks_calibration.name: Remote Control Sticks Need Calibration
solutions: Calibrate the remote control sticks 5 times in a row.

rc_stick_left_worn_or_damaged.name: Remote Control Left Stick Potentiometer Worn Out or Damaged
solutions: Replace the remote control left stick.

rc_stick_right_worn_or_damaged.name: Remote Control Right Stick Potentiometer Worn Out or Damaged
solutions: Replace the remote control right stick.
